verses.verse: Now <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> it came to <S%H3068>pass<s%>, that the Lord <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, <S%H4872>Moses<s%>' <S%H8334>minister<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> is <S%H4191>dead<s%>; now therefore <S%H6965>arise<s%>, go <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, <S%H5971>you<s%>, and all this people, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which I do <S%H5414>give<s%> to <S%H1121>them<s%>, even to the sons of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
Every <S%H4725>place<s%> that the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of your <S%H7272>foot<s%> shall tread <S%H1869>upon<s%>, that have I <S%H5414>given<s%> to <S%H1696>you<s%>, as I said unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

From the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> and this <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> even unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, all the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2850>Hittites<s%>, and unto the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> toward the going <S%H3996>down<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, shall be your <S%H1366>coast<s%>.

There shall not any <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you all the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2416>life<s%>: as I was with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so I will be with <S%H7503>you<s%>: I will not fail <S%H5800>you<s%>, nor forsake you.

Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>: for to this <S%H5971>people<s%> shall you divide for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to give <S%H5414>them<s%>.

Only be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H553>courageous<s%>, that you may <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all the <S%H8451>law<s%>, which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H5493>you<s%>: turn not from it to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> or to the <S%H8040>left<s%>, that you may <S%H7919>prosper<s%> wherever you <S%H3212>go<s%>.

This <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%> shall not <S%H4185>depart<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; but you shall <S%H1897>meditate<s%> in it <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%>, that you may <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to all that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H6743>it<s%>: for then you shall make your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H6743>prosperous<s%>, and then you shall have good <S%H7919>success<s%>.

Have not I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H2388>you<s%>? Be strong and of a good <S%H553>courage<s%>; be not <S%H6206>afraid<s%>, neither be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is with you wherever you <S%H3212>go<s%>.

<S%H5674>Pass<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the <S%H4264>host<s%>, and <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3559>Prepare<s%> <S%H6720>food<s%>; for within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> you to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>.

And to the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and to the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and to <S%H2677>half<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>, saying, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has given you <S%H5117>rest<s%>, and has <S%H5414>given<s%> you this <S%H776>land<s%>.

Your <S%H802>wives<s%>, your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and your <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, shall <S%H3427>remain<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>; but you shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H2571>armed<s%>, all the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, and help <S%H5826>them<s%>;

Until the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5117>given<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H5117>rest<s%>, as he has given <S%H3423>you<s%>, and they also have possessed the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H7725>them<s%>: then you shall return unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of your <S%H3425>possession<s%>, and <S%H3423>enjoy<s%> <S%H4872>it<s%>, which Moses the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> you on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> toward the <S%H4217>sunrising<s%>.

And they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, All that you <S%H6680>command<s%> us we will <S%H6213>do<s%>, and <S%H834>wherever<s%> you <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H3212>us<s%>, we will go.

According as we <S%H8085>listened<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> in all <S%H8085>things<s%>, so will we listen unto <S%H3068>you<s%>: only the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> be with <S%H4872>you<s%>, as he was with Moses.

<S%H376>Whoever<s%> he be that does <S%H4784>rebel<s%> against your <S%H6310>commandment<s%>, and will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> unto your <S%H1697>words<s%> in all that you <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H4191>him<s%>, he shall be put to death: only be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>.
